meanings.definition: Lacking a pass or way through
meanings.sent1: The passless mountain was too steep to climb.
meanings.sent2: The closed gate made the path passless.
meanings.sent3: The maze was passless, causing the adventurers to get lost.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was like a passless fortress, impenetrable to love.
meanings.sent5: The dense forest was a passless barrier to the hikers.

meanings.definition: Unable to be passed or crossed
meanings.sent1: The river was so wide and passless that no boat could cross it.
meanings.sent2: The giant boulder was passless, blocking the road completely.
meanings.sent3: The magician cast a spell making the doorway passless to intruders.
meanings.sent4: The chasm was a passless void, separating the two sides forever.
meanings.sent5: The massive wall stood tall and passless, keeping enemies at bay.

meanings.sent1: The dense fog made the forest passless, hiding any paths.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins were passless, with no visible entrance.
meanings.sent3: The treasure map led them to a passless dead-end.
meanings.sent4: The labyrinth was a passless puzzle, trapping the explorers inside.
meanings.sent5: The snowstorm left the landscape passless, covering all trails.
